modules.name: canvas
modules.description: an OpenGL canvas for audio visualization with custom shaders

modules.name: glcv
modules.description: generates cv, envelopes, & more with glsl shaders

modules.name: glab
modules.description: a glsl shader lab for experimental remixing of shaders and live-coding

modules.name: glib
modules.description: a glsl shader library that manages loading shaders from local files and sharing shaders between modules

modules.name: glaze
modules.description: glaze (glsl shoegaze) is an 8-mode effect module that supports both dsp & shader-based audio processing
